author: Khaleda Rahman
title: New Jersey Governor Warns Against 'Illegal' Gatherings: 'No Corona Parties. We Will Crash Your Party'
description: Officers from Ewing Township broke up a house party where 47 people, including a DJ, violated the state's stay-at-home order.
content:
New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy warned residents that authorities will "crash" any parties held during the coronavirus pandemic after police broke up a house party where almost 50 people had crammed into a small apartment.
